edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class ClosedQuestion

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Question
        • edu.ucla.wise.commons.ClosedQuestion

  • public class ClosedQuestion
extends Question
    This class is a subclass of Question and represents a closed ended question on the page.
